_meanings:
{@--1@} To go 
between, to stand in one's way, 
intervene to separate; {#rAtrerenaM tadaMtariyAt#} Ait.
Br.

{@--2@} To exclude from, to pass
over, omit.

{@--3@} To disappear, see
{#aMtarita#} below. ({#--ayati#}) To come or
step between, interpose; {#darduraka#} 
{#upasftya aMtarayati#} <ls>Mk. 2</ls> (it may also
mean, ‘separates the two’).
